meanings.definition: A device used to demagnetize or reduce the magnetic field of a material.
meanings.sent1: The degaussers in the lab helped remove unwanted magnetism from the metal.
meanings.sent2: The technicians used degaussers to erase sensitive data from old hard drives.
meanings.sent3: The degaussers at the factory decided to go on strike, causing chaos in the production line.
meanings.sent4: Her smile acted like a degausser, wiping away any negativity in the room.
meanings.sent5: The degaussers hummed softly as they worked their magic on the metal, making it safe to use.
